An '''umbrella organization''' is an association of (often related, industry-specific) institutions, who work together formally to coordinate activities or pool resources. In business, political, or other environments, one group, the umbrella organization, provides resources and often an identity to the smaller organizations. Sometimes in this kind of arrangement, the umbrella organization is to some degree responsible for the groups under its care. Compare to [[franchising|franchises]] and [[subsidiary|subsidiaries]]. There may be many reasons for establishing/joining an umbrella organization: * The ability to carry out activities which could not be accomplished alone, due to ** [[Economies of scale]]; ** A better pool of experts and experience; ** Shared apprenticeship and exchange of know-how; * A sense of community and support that makes people and corporations derive utility from multilateral and shared activities; * An increased [[brand]]/public awareness. * Legality of pursued action(s). == Example organizations == * [[ACTIVE]] * [[AFL-CIO]] and other [[national trade union center]]s * [[Canadian Hockey League]] * [[CIA]] * [[DD172]] * [[Department of Public Safety]] * [[European Music Council]] * [[Fox Network]] * [[Federation of Student Islamic Societies]] * General Grand Council of Cryptic Masons International * [[Girls on the Run|Girls on the Run International]] * [[International Co-operative Alliance]] * [[Independent Sector]] * [[IFOAM|International Federation of Organic Agriculture Movements]] * The former [[KGB]] * [[Mujahedeen Shura Council]] * [[National Retail Federation]] * [[National Wrestling Alliance]] * [[OSGeo]] * [[Personhood USA]] * [[Public Health Training Network]]<ref>[http://www.cdc.gov/phtn/overview.htm cdc.gov]</ref> * [[Software in the Public Interest]] * [[Transport for London]] * [[Ulster Defence Association]] * [[United Jewish Communities]] * [[VIATeC]] (Victoria Advanced Technology Council), [[Greater Victoria]], [[British Columbia]] * [[Yamaguchi-gumi]] * [[Bursa City Council]] * [[AHC Federation of Europe]] ==See also== * [[Big tent]] * [[Supraorganization]] * [[Umbrella brand]] * [[Umbrella company]] * [[Umbrella fund]] * [[Umbrella school]] * [[Umbrella term]] * [[Umbrella Media]] * [[Umbrella Worldwide Corporation]] ==References== {{Reflist}} [[Category:Supraorganizations| ]] [[Category:Types of organization]]
